physiology.description: is a database of elecrophysiological properties text-mined from the biomedical literature as a function of neuron type.
provides data about neurotransmitter properties for submitted neurons.
contains spatial distribution maps of rat olfactory bulb in response to odorant stimuli.

provides a database of neuronal cell types based on multimodal characterization of single cells to enable data-driven approaches to classification. For more details about the experiments, please refer to the technical white paper.

morphology.description: contains a curated repository of digitally reconstructed neurons.
provides annotated images, videos and animations of cellular processes.

provides a database of neuronal cell types based on multimodal characterization of single cells to enable data-driven approaches to classification. For more details about the experiments, please refer to the technical white paper.
has 3D models of rat neuronal morphologies.

expression.description: contains gene expression data and maps of the mouse brain and spinal cord.
A genome-wide database of gene expression in the mouse brain.

models.description: is a curated relational database that provides for the storage and retrieval of computational neuroscience model.
provides high quality computational neuroscience models. ModelDB is tightly coupled with NeuronDB.
IonChannelGenealogy provides a quantitative assay of publicly available ion channel models. Descriptions of the columns are available here.

anatomy.description: contains sections stained for cell bodies or nerve fibers, as well as corresponding MRI sections through a living human brain.
is a high-resolution brain atlas of primate and non-primate brains.

is an aggregated dataset of connectivity statements from CoCoMac,Connectome Wiki, the Hippocampal-Parahippocampal Table of Temporal-Lobe.com and Avian Brain Circuitry Database. Connectome Wiki, CoCoMac, and Avian Brain Circuitry Database are no longer in service, so the links may not be functional.
